rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0001
rows.name:
Who would've thought a place like this
existed under the Cloud Sea?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0002
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0003
rows.name:
Us salvagers dive deep, but I've never
dreamed there'd be this enormous
space down here.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0004
rows.name:
You'd be hard-pressed finding another
place as vast as this, that's for sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0005
rows.name: Did people live here once, d'you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0006
rows.name:
If the whole space is filled with
buildings like the ones around here...

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0007
rows.name:
There must've been a heck of a lot of
people living in them.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0008
rows.name: True, that.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0009
rows.name:
And the number of people aside, can
you imagine the work it would take to
cover this whole place in buildings?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0010
rows.name: I can hardly imagine...

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0011
rows.name:
I've salvaged a whole bunch of
treasures over the years with functions
we could never figure out...

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0012
rows.name:
If this world is where they came from,
I've gotta say it makes sense.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0013
rows.name:
In any age, the ambitions of men
build civilization up, and those same
ambitions bring it crumbling down.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0014
rows.name: That's so tragic...

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0015
rows.name: Hey, Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0016
rows.name: Why is this place in ruins anyway...?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0017
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0018
rows.name: Because of the Cloud Sea?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0019
rows.name: There must have been a war.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0101
rows.name:
You think the Cloud Sea appeared one
day and covered the whole thing up?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0102
rows.name:
Yeah. The crops wouldn't have grown
any more, so people would have had
to leave.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0103
rows.name:
And everyone would've wound up
living above the Cloud Sea instead.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0104
rows.name: Does that make sense?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0105
rows.name:
I've got a feeling it's the
other way round.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0106
rows.name:
You're saying the Cloud Sea caused
problems here, so people wound up
living on the Divine Beasts.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0107
rows.name:
But I think the problems here came
first, and that's how the Cloud Sea
and the Divine Beasts were made.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0108
rows.name:
And once it became uninhabitable, they
went and made a new place to live.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0109
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0110
rows.name: What do you think, Nia?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0111
rows.name: Well, let's see...

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0112
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Who freaking knows?!

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0113
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I mean, this stuff must've happened
more than just centuries ago.
How're we meant to have any idea?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0114
rows.name:
Well, that's why we're speculating,
right?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0115
rows.name: Yeah, but I reckon it's a waste of time.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0116
rows.name:
We still know barely anything about
this place. If we want to work stuff out,
we should search for more clues.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0117
rows.name: Well, that's a fair point.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0201
rows.name:
I think you hit the nail on the head.
Some terrible war sounds pretty likely.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0202
rows.name:
But would a war cause THIS
much devastation?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0203
rows.name:
Maybe it was some
natural disaster or other?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0204
rows.name:
Not out of the question, but a natural
disaster's not gonna level everything.
It wouldn't be this widespread.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0205
rows.name:
Take a look outside. Ruin as far
as the eye can see.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0206
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0207
rows.name:
You could say the same about war,
though.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0208
rows.name:
What kind of a war could destroy
a city this big?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0209
rows.name:
Maybe...they had some kind of
incredible weapon we've never seen.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0210
rows.name: Or just one hell of a lot of 'em.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0211
rows.name:
I hear a crazy number of Blades fought
in the war 500 years ago.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0212
rows.name:
You think something like that
happened before?

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0213
rows.name: Hard to say for sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0214
rows.name:
I think maybe we need to explore
a bit further.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0301
rows.name:
This place is beyond anything we've
imagined, after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0302
rows.name:
To be honest, I think it's
actually kind of exciting.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0303
rows.name: Can't deny it.

rows.label: kizunatalk047_msg0304
rows.name:
This world's a bigger place
than we knew.
